game.author: ryvnf
game.name: mineclonia
game.short_description: Survival sandbox game inspired by Minecraft.
game.title: Mineclonia

long_description:
This mod allows players to harvest a crop and plant the item the player is holding with a single right-click.

It supports the following crops from mcl_farming and mcl_nether:

* Beetroot
* Carrot
* Potato
* Wheat
* Nether Wart

I have tested it with Mineclonia, so it should work with MineClone2 or MineClone5.
name: mcl_quick_harvest_replant
short_description: Harvest and replant crops with one right-click in MineClone2/MineClone5/Mineclonia
title: Mcl Quick Harvest & Replant
